root.name: add
root.tip: Add package(s) to pyproject.toml and install them

root.name: completion
root.tip: Generate completion scripts for the given shell

root.name: export
root.tip: Export the locked packages set to other formats

root.name: fix
root.tip: Fix the project problems according to the latest version of PDM

root.name: import
root.tip: Import project metadata from other formats

root.name: list
root.tip: List packages installed in the current working set

root.name: outdated
root.tip: Check for outdated packages and list the latest versions on indexes.

root.name: publish
root.tip: Build and publish the project to PyPI

root.name: run
root.tip: Run commands or scripts with local packages loaded

root.name: self
tip: Manage the PDM program itself (previously known as plugin)

root.name: sync
root.tip: Synchronize the current working set with lock file

root.name: use
root.tip: Use the given python version or path as base interpreter. If not found, PDM will try to install one.

common_options.name: -c
tip: Specify another config file path. [env var: PDM_CONFIG_FILE]

common_options.name: -v
common_options.tip: Use `-v` for detailed output and `-vv` for more detailed

common_options.name: --no-cache
tip: Disable the cache for the current command. [env var: PDM_NO_CACHE]

common_options.name: -I
common_options.tip: Ignore the Python path saved in .pdm-python. [env var: PDM_IGNORE_SAVED_PYTHON]

common_options.name: --pep582
tip: Print the command line to be eval'd by the shell.

completion_info.description: A modern Python package and dependency manager supporting the latest PEP standards
